ids_info.name: real_time_data
ids_info.description: Description of the data bus circulating on the real time data network of the machine. This is typically used (but not only) as an interface to the Plasma Control System (PCS)

real_time_data/topic.documentation: List of topics. Signals are grouped by topic. Within real_time_data IDS: Description of the data bus circulating on the real time data network of the machine. This is typically used (but not only) as an interface to the Plasma Control System (PCS).

real_time_data/topic/name.documentation: Topic name. Within real_time_data IDS: Description of the data bus circulating on the real time data network of the machine. This is typically used (but not only) as an interface to the Plasma Control System (PCS). Within topic container: List of topics. Signals are grouped by topic.

real_time_data/topic/signal.documentation: List of signals that are allocated to the PCS interface. Within real_time_data IDS: Description of the data bus circulating on the real time data network of the machine. This is typically used (but not only) as an interface to the Plasma Control System (PCS). Within topic container: List of topics. Signals are grouped by topic.

real_time_data/topic/signal/name.documentation: Signal name. Within real_time_data IDS: Description of the data bus circulating on the real time data network of the machine. This is typically used (but not only) as an interface to the Plasma Control System (PCS). Within topic container: List of topics. Signals are grouped by topic. Within signal container: List of signals that are allocated to the PCS interface.

real_time_data/topic/signal/data_type.documentation: Signal data type. Within real_time_data IDS: Description of the data bus circulating on the real time data network of the machine. This is typically used (but not only) as an interface to the Plasma Control System (PCS). Within topic container: List of topics. Signals are grouped by topic. Within signal container: List of signals that are allocated to the PCS interface.

real_time_data/topic/signal/allocated_po.documentation: Allocation of signal to a position in the SDN (1..N), or several positions in case of signal reshaping; this will be implementation specific. Within real_time_data IDS: Description of the data bus circulating on the real time data network of the machine. This is typically used (but not only) as an interface to the Plasma Control System (PCS). Within topic container: List of topics. Signals are grouped by topic. Within signal container: List of signals that are allocated to the PCS interface.

real_time_data/topic/signal/data_str.documentation: Signal data (e.g. diagnostic signal or PCS command), serialized as a string. Within real_time_data IDS: Description of the data bus circulating on the real time data network of the machine. This is typically used (but not only) as an interface to the Plasma Control System (PCS). Within topic container: List of topics. Signals are grouped by topic. Within signal container: List of signals that are allocated to the PCS interface.

real_time_data/topic/signal/quality.documentation: Indicator of the quality of the signal. Following ITER PCS documentation (https://user.iter.org/?uid=354SJ3&action=get_document), possible values are: 1 - GOOD (the nominal state); 2 - INVALID (data no usable); 3 - DATA INTEGRITY ERROR (e.g. out of bounds with respect to expectations, calibration error,...). Within real_time_data IDS: Description of the data bus circulating on the real time data network of the machine. This is typically used (but not only) as an interface to the Plasma Control System (PCS). Within topic container: List of topics. Signals are grouped by topic. Within signal container: List of signals that are allocated to the PCS interface.

real_time_data/topic/time_stamp.documentation: Time of creation for all signals belonging to this topic. A set of time stamps can be recorded if needed. Within real_time_data IDS: Description of the data bus circulating on the real time data network of the machine. This is typically used (but not only) as an interface to the Plasma Control System (PCS). Within topic container: List of topics. Signals are grouped by topic.

real_time_data/topic/sample.documentation: Index of sample (time stamp counter). Within real_time_data IDS: Description of the data bus circulating on the real time data network of the machine. This is typically used (but not only) as an interface to the Plasma Control System (PCS). Within topic container: List of topics. Signals are grouped by topic.
